Text: FW LC Facilities Material Litigation wordingOriginal Message From Martin Sophie Sent Tuesday October AM To Mintz Jordan Ephross Joel Cc Edgley Anne Von Bock Und Polach Marcus Perkins Mary Evans Mark London Legal Subject LC Facilities Material Litigation wording Importance High To confirm my conversation with Joel just now We have been speaking to Michael Brown about giving the representation contained in Clause f of the West LB Facility Agreement relating to material litigation accompanied with a general disclosure letter Given our distance from the SEC inquiries and other potential litigation we are not in position to confirm whether or not such litigation has a reasonable possibility of success andor the effects an adverse decision might have on Enron Corps business and more importantly consolidated financial position or consolidated results Accordingly we cannot give this representation here in Europe and thus cannot issue LC Requests under the West LB facility until we receive a short written confirmation from i a senior Enron Corp officer for example Jeff or Ben and ii a senior Enron Corp lawyer eg Mark Haedicke or Jordan that as a factual matter Enron Corp is not as of today in breach of the representation contained in Clause f and thus we can issue clean LC Request Forms without a qualification to this representation but with if necessary a disclosure letter about the SEC inquiry and other litigation We have also been asked by West LB to explain why yesterday we issued the LC Request form attaching Schedule A ie stating that we could not give the Clause f representation and today or tomorrow we intend to issue an LC Request without such qualification to Clause f I should be grateful if you would draft this letter or let me know the circumstances behind the issuance of the original LC Request yesterday Please call Marcus or me if you want to discuss this further My direct line is and mobile is Kind regards Sophie Martin
payment instructions ERMTCitibank NA New York NY ERMT Corp Ac
Cash as of pm Cc This schedule does not include the following items estimated for tomorrow MM Entergy Koch London MM BNP MM Sweep receivable sale

RE Confusion Around Treasury Workstation Cc Wes and I have discussed and are in agreement Well handle the issue Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Wednesday January AM To Perlman Beth Piper Greg Perkins Mary Colwell Wes Cc Webb Jay Koehler Anne C Subject RE Confusion Around Treasury Workstation I had presumed it got transferred Wes could you please sort Original Message From Perlman Beth Sent Wednesday January AM To Kitchen Louise Piper Greg Perkins Mary Cc Webb Jay Koehler Anne C Subject Confusion Around Treasury Workstation There seems to be some confusion around who will own the intellectual property for the treasury workstation application It was Marys and my understanding that the IP would remain with the estate and a license would be given to Netco to use the application Jay was under the impression that the IP was to be transferred to Netco Could someone please clarify The estate Mary Perkins would like the IP to remain with the estate If this is a problem please call Mary directly Thanks Beth

Re Manual Wires sign off Cc Changes to the manual list for North America need to be authorized by Wes and Sally We are specifically limiting the number of signers I think that what we need to do is immediately address the issues that are causing your wires to miss the standard process We did not have the issue prior to SAP Please outline your processing requirements and we can work together with AP and SAP to fix the underlying issue Thanks for the help Mary From Sheila Glover AM To Mary CT cc Brent A CT Sally CT Laurel CT Theresa T CT Subject Manual Wires sign off Mary I want my name and Theresa Brogans added to the authorized approvers on manual wires Thanks Sheila Forwarded by Sheila GloverHOUECT on AM From Sheila Glover AM To Mary CT Larry NRON Wes CT cc Frieda NRON Carolyn NRON Laurel CT Brent A CT Sally CT Subject Manual Wires Mary Larry and Wes We just received a faxed copy of the Manual Wire and Same Day Payment memo which was sent by Betty Tauzier on Rate Currency trades fx which is settled the following day and requires next day payments for FX Currently we are severely hampered because our infomation is required into Unify by for an Accounts Payable run at for next day payments We are still trading after these cutoffs and tying out the days activity with Trading Therefore we currently have to rely on manual wires to make payments to our counterparties on the value date We need to get timeframes which mirror our business requirements I would like to get the Accounts Payable run for our companies and moved to after pm Information is not due to the bank until next day am London time Please let Laurel and me know what changes can be done to our processing flows Thanks Sheila
Congratulationswanted to send my congratulations I know that you really deserve this promotion Good Luck Mary
Congratulationswanted to send my congratulations I know that you really deserve this promotion Good Luck Mary

RE ENA Wire instructions Cc Just confirming this is DIP money If so use acct Enron North America Original Message From Glover Sheila Sent Tuesday December PM To Perkins Mary Cc Birmingham Mary Shackleton Sara Subject ENA Wire instructions Importance High Mary Do you have an Enron North America Corp bank account I can use for Goldman Sachs The hedge book is in a grouping of accounts under ENA In the past we have wired to ECT Investments Incs Citibank account but this is probably not a good idea at this time The amount is Please advise Sheila

RE Preliminary EES Burn Schedule Cc Wade You need to get this information into the Forecast system FYI the MellonKey lockboxes wont be moved at least not right now only Bank of America Original Message From Stubblefield Wade Sent Wednesday December AM To Leff Dan Dietrich Janet Bowen Jr Raymond Nelson Kimberley Perkins Mary Marino Thea Delainey David W Herndon Rogers Black Don Wurzel Steve Steffes James D Subject Preliminary EES Burn Schedule To meet Treasurys requirement for day ahead notice of funding requirements and also cash forecasts required by the courts I have put together the attached very simple daily burn schedule for the balance of December I have a couple of key assumptions We will continue to pay CAISO through December note the actual amount is a moving target and we will try and notice of any changes as soon as we know of them We will pay NYISO when it comes up again and we will not fund ERCOT anymore At this point I am not aware of any other prepayment obligation or for that matter postpayment in any other jurisdiction ie all other contracts are being terminatedturned back Please advise if this is inaccurate I have heard for gas we may be OK through December Don please advise I have not factored in any EES receipts from customers yet We are working on a forecast but since all lockboxes are being moved I assume significant delays and wanted to focus on disbursements We will fund EFS daily I did assume they would have some receipts THEASTEVE please trueup the disbursments based on whatever better data you have esp around pay dates and give me a better idea about receipts I assume I am not going to incur any other material trade payables other than those listed Especially that would be due in next days Mary and Ray unless you hear otherwise from me assume the scheduled amounts for Wed and Thursday are good

FW gscappdfpdfMark I will call you re this doc Mary Original Message From Dobin Nora Sent Monday November PM To Perkins Mary Subject FW gscappdfpdf Attached is both Corporate Account Agreement and final Supplement Original Message From Perkins Mary Sent Friday October PM To Dobin Nora Subject FW gscappdfpdf Original Message From Hardt Barbara mailto Sent Friday October PM To Perkins Mary Subject FW gscappdfpdf Original Message From Hardt Barbara Sent Friday October PM To Hardt Barbara Subject gscappdfpdf gscappdfpdf
